insert into t_experience_bid (id, time, title, apr, period, invest_period, min_invest_amount, repayment_type, status, has_invest_amount, release_time, repayment_time, real_repayment_time, invest_count) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{period,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{investPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{minInvestAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{repaymentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{hasInvestAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{releaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{repaymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{realRepaymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{investCount,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_experience_bid set time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apr = #{apr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, period = #{period,jdbcType=INTEGER}, invest_period = #{investPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, min_invest_amount = #{minInvestAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, repayment_type = #{repaymentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, has_invest_amount = #{hasInvestAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, release_time = #{releaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, repayment_time = #{repaymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, real_repayment_time = #{realRepaymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, invest_count = #{investCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, time, title, apr, period, invest_period, min_invest_amount, repayment_type, status, has_invest_amount, release_time, repayment_time, real_repayment_time, invest_count from t_experience_bid where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
